examples.html:
<ff-data-table :columns="cols" :rows="rows" :show-search="true"
	search-placeholder="Search here..." v-model:search="search">
	<template v-slot:actions>
		<ff-button>Press Me!</ff-button>
		<ff-button>Click Me!</ff-button>
	</template>
</ff-data-table>

<ff-data-table :columns="cols">
	<template v-slot:rows>
		<ff-data-table-row>
			<ff-data-table-cell>Testing</ff-data-table-cell>
			<ff-data-table-cell>We can put anything in here...</ff-data-table-cell>
			<ff-data-table-cell>
				<ff-notification-pill :count="4"/>
			</ff-data-table-cell>
		</ff-data-table-row>
	</template>
</ff-data-table>

<ff-data-table>
	<template v-slot:header>
		<ff-data-table-row>
			<ff-data-table-cell>Custom Header</ff-data-table-cell>
			<ff-data-table-cell>We can put anything in here too...</ff-data-table-cell>
			<ff-data-table-cell>
				<ff-notification-pill :count="74"/>
			</ff-data-table-cell>
		</ff-data-table-row>
	</template>
	<template v-slot:rows>
		<ff-data-table-row selectable @select="doSomething">
			<ff-data-table-cell>Testing</ff-data-table-cell>
			<ff-data-table-cell>We can put anything in here...</ff-data-table-cell>
			<ff-data-table-cell>
				<ff-notification-pill :count="4"/>
			</ff-data-table-cell>
		</ff-data-table-row>
	</template>
</ff-data-table>

props.description: An array of objects that define the column headers and assocated keys in the `rows` data. e.g. [{key: 'colA', label: 'Column A'}]
An array of objects defining each row of data. Each object should contains the relevant key defined in the columns array. e.g. [{colA: 1}]
Defines whether or not the full row can be clicked, in order to emit a 'row-selected' event.
Whether or not to display the ff-text-input to filter the table content
If `show-search` is true, then this proeprty will set the placeholder of the search bar.

emits.description: The object associated with the row clicked.
